entry.title: Introducing Signals
entry.summary: Signals are an easier way to manage your application's state compared to hooks. A signal is a container object with a special "value" property that holds some value. Reading a signal's value property from within a component or computed function automatically subscribes to updates, and writing to the value property triggers subscriptions.
